title: Scientists, Scholars and a Rubik's Cube Champ, Oh My
snippet: Vineeth Vajipey. Vineeth Vajipey wants to dispel the notion that STEM fields lack creativity. Among his inventions is an app for a smart vending machine with facial recognition, a device that adjusts the brightness and color of lights based on hand gestures and a game where musicians guess musical notes. And those were just for fun.
